name: h3
description: Step up to the plate with the Louisville Slugger Savannah Bananas JBB Drop 10 Coach Pitch Bat, designed for young sluggers eager to make an impact. This USSSA Certified bat showcases a balanced swing feel, perfect for coach pitch hitting, with a 2 3/4 inch barrel diameter for a larger sweet spot. Crafted from SL Hyper Alloy, this bat offers maximum pop, while the premium end cap enhances its balanced feel, ensuring every swing is smooth and controlled. The vibrant blue, yellow, and white colorway not only stands out visually but is complemented by the Premium LS Pro Comfort Grip, providing increased tack and cushion for superior control and feel.
